transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Yeah, Mr. Rajiv?
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: Rajiv, I am calling from IndiaMART head office.
Customer: Yeah, yeah.
Executive: Sir, today you called on our customer care on the morning.
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: You want the invoice.
Customer: Yeah, I wanted invoice.
Executive: See, check your email. I already sent you the invoice and I send you with your boss also on WhatsApp.
Customer: Okay. So can you send the invoice to my number?
Executive: Tell me your number, please.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Just wait a minute. I have, I have, just wait.
Customer: Be on call.
Executive: We have two invoice.
Customer: Yeah, yeah, two invoice.
Executive: I shared. Please check on your WhatsApp.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Okay, thank you, thank you, ma'am.
Executive: Please open and check this, sir. And confirm me.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: This is what?
Customer: This is 2023 invoice.
Executive: And one I sent for the I want 2025 year.
Executive: Sir, when 2025, we didn't make any payment, then how can I give you the invoice of 2025? You make the payment of in September 2000 24, 14th June 2024, see this. You didn't make any huge payment on this. So how can I share you the 25 bill, sir? There is Can you open?
Customer: Last payment date, last payment date.
Executive: Check it, sir. I shared you the snapshot. That's why I asked you to be hold on the call. You are on a hurry to close this.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Sir, TrustSeal two year payment is done on 10th January 2023. Take care. Second payment has been done on 14th June 2024. This is for the TrustSeal two year. Rest of the payment has been done for the credit buyleads. There is 500 588 rupees or 706 rupees. There is no big amount payment has been done after 2024.
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: I think you have a doubt. In September month, you guys didn't make any payment on IndiaMART, sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Then, sir?
Customer: Done. Okay, I'll say to the boss to make payment, okay?
Executive: Sir, which payment you want to make?
Customer: Um, this is boss decision. Okay, I will concern with the boss.
Executive: Sir, I am just asking which invoice you are asking in 2025. In 2025, you didn't make any payment. So invoice kahan se dungi sir aapko?
Customer: 18 October ka bhejiye aur 18 October ke andar kitna invoice tha?
Executive: One second, sir. Main toh aap hi ka khol rahi hu. Aap hi ka 18 October ko kahan hai sir kuch? 18 October ko aapne mere sath buyleads purchase kiya hai sir?
Customer: Buyleads purchase kiya hai toh uska invoice bhejiye ek baar.
Executive: Are sir. Aapko 584 rupees ka bhi invoice chahiye?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aur bataiye aur kab ka chahiye sir? September ka bhi chahiye?
Customer: Nahi, September ka nahi chahiye. Sirf October ka chahiye kyunki hamara filing ho raha hai isiliye.
Executive: Toh 588 rupees wala jo hai uska bhi bhej do.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: One second. Woh bhi bhej deti hu.
Customer: Theek hai, bhej dijiye.
Executive: Aap call pe rahiye, sir. Aapko itni jaldi kyun hai? Aapne agar complain open kiya hai toh hume bhi toh aapko sahi se cheeze karni hai na, sir?
Customer: Jaldi nahi kar rahe hain. Abhi bol rahe hain ki aap bhejiye na, main dekh raha hu.
Executive: Sir, aap dekhiye, main dekh bhej di aapko.
Customer: Okay, dekhta hu.
Executive: Dekhiye chat pe.
Customer: Thoda internet issue ho raha hai.
Customer: Theek hai. Yahi invoice tha.
Executive: Ho gaya?
Customer: Ho gaya, ho gaya.
Executive: Aapka request main close kar rahi hu.
Customer: Theek. Close kar dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai? Ha. Aur apne boss ko bhi bata dijiyega. Maine boss ke WhatsApp pe bhi bhej diya hai sab kuch. Theek hai, theek hai, main bata dunga.
Executive: Thank you.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants invoices for specific payments.



Resolution:

- Executive shared invoices on WhatsApp.

- Executive clarified payment dates and amounts.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will discuss payment with boss.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- invoice, payment, buyleads, trustseal
